price: 61. Waana Qahraha awoodda badan uu wax ku Maquuniyo, ee ka korreeya addoomahiisa, wuxuu idiin soo diraa ilaalo (malaa'ig) korkiinna ah, jeer markuu midkiin u yimaado mowdku, waxaa oofsada Rusushayada (Malaa’igta ah), mana gabood falaan.
arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلۡقَاهِرُ فَوۡقَ عِبَادِهِۦۖ وَيُرۡسِلُ عَلَيۡكُمۡ حَفَظَةً حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا جَآءَ أَحَدَكُمُ ٱلۡمَوۡتُ تَوَفَّتۡهُ رُسُلُنَا وَهُمۡ لَا يُفَرِّطُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wahuwa al-qāhiru fawqa ʿibādihi wayur'silu ʿalaykum ḥafaẓatan ḥattā idhā jāa aḥadakumu al-mawtu tawaffathu rusulunā wahum lā yufarriṭūna
